sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SECURITY_PRINCIPAL ( PRINCIPAL_ID, DOMAIN_ID,PARENT_ID,SHORT_PATH,FULL_PATH,PRINCIPAL_NAME,CLASSNAME,IS_MAPPING_ONLY,IS_ENABLED,THEME,DEFAULT_PAGE,PRINCIPAL_TYPE,PRINCIPAL_ORDER,CREATION_DATE,MODIFIED_DATE,PRINCIPAL_INFO01,PRINCIPAL_INFO02,PRINCIPAL_INFO03,PRINCIPAL_DESC ) VALUES ( #principalId#,#domainId#,#parentId#,#shortPath#,CONCAT( '/role/', #shortPath#),#principalName#,'com.saltware.enview.security.InternalRolePrincipalImpl',0,1,#theme#,#defaultPage#,'R',(SELECT count(PRINCIPAL_ID) FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL a WHERE PARENT_ID=#parentId#),#creationDate#,#modifiedDate#,#principalInfo01#,#principalInfo02#,#principalInfo03#,#principalDesc# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SECURITY_PRINCIPAL SET PRINCIPAL_ID=#principalId#, PARENT_ID=#parentId#, SHORT_PATH=#shortPath#,PRINCIPAL_NAME=#principalName#,THEME=#theme#,DEFAULT_PAGE=#defaultPage#, PRINCIPAL_ORDER=#principalOrder#, MODIFIED_DATE=#modifiedDate#, PRINCIPAL_INFO01=#principalInfo01#, PRINCIPAL_INFO02=#principalInfo02#, PRINCIPAL_INFO03=#principalInfo03#, PRINCIPAL_DESC=#principalDesc# WHERE 1=1 PRINCIPAL_ID=#principalId#

sqlMap.select: SELECT a.PRINCIPAL_ID,a.PARENT_ID,a.SHORT_PATH,a.PRINCIPAL_NAME,a.THEME,DEFAULT_PAGE,a.PRINCIPAL_TYPE,a.PRINCIPAL_ORDER,a.CREATION_DATE,a.MODIFIED_DATE,a.PRINCIPAL_INFO01,a.PRINCIPAL_INFO02,a.PRINCIPAL_INFO03,a.PRINCIPAL_DESC,b.`DOMAIN`,b.DOMAIN_ID FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL aLEFT OUTER JOIN `DOMAIN` b ON a.DOMAIN_ID = b.DOMAIN_ID WHERE a.PRINCIPAL_ID=(SELECT PARENT_ID FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE PRINCIPAL_ID=#principalId#)
